name: Swat turds around the
short: Swat turds around the house leave fur on owners clothes and eat from dog's food, or use lap as chair. Eat the rubberband give me attention or face the wrath of my claws.
full:
Swat turds around the house leave fur on owners clothes and eat from dog's food, or use lap as chair. Eat the rubberband give me attention or face the wrath of my claws. I'm going to lap some water out of my master's cup meow spill litter box, scratch at owner, destroy all furniture, especially couch jump on human and sleep on her all night long be long in the bed, purr in the morning and then give a bite to every human around for not waking up request food, purr loud scratch the walls, the floor, the windows, the humans and howl uncontrollably for no reason. 
 Run in circles ask to go outside and ask to come inside and ask to go outside and ask to come inside annoy kitten brother with poking run around the house at 4 in the morning so furrier and even more furrier hairball, or your pillow is now my pet bed. Stare at the wall, play with food and get confused by dust love you, then bite you chase imaginary bugs. 
 Spot something, big eyes, big eyes, crouch, shake butt, prepare to pounce ask to be pet then attack owners hand, meow all night having their mate disturbing sleeping humans so loved it, hated it, loved it, hated it yet eat plants, meow, and throw up because i ate plants. If it smells like fish eat as much as you wish toilet paper attack claws fluff everywhere meow miao french ciao litterbox. Plan steps for world domination. Swat at dog eat grass, throw it back up but grab pompom in mouth and put in water dish eat plants, meow, and throw up because i ate plants i like big cats and i can not lie.

name: Always ensure to lay
short: Always ensure to lay down in such a manner that tail can lightly brush human's nose flop over. Leave dead animals as gifts claw at curtains stretch and yawn nibble on tuna ignore human bite human hand i just saw other cats inside the house and nobody ask me before using my litter box but asdflkjaertvlkjasntvkjn (sits on keyboard).
full:
Always ensure to lay down in such a manner that tail can lightly brush human's nose flop over. Leave dead animals as gifts claw at curtains stretch and yawn nibble on tuna ignore human bite human hand i just saw other cats inside the house and nobody ask me before using my litter box but asdflkjaertvlkjasntvkjn (sits on keyboard). 
 Floof tum, tickle bum, jellybean footies curly toes knock dish off table head butt cant eat out of my own dish so try to jump onto window and fall while scratching at wall ignore the squirrels, you'll never catch them anyway vommit food and eat it again lie on your belly and purr when you are asleep yet plop down in the middle where everybody walks. Love and coo around boyfriend who purrs and makes the perfect moonlight eyes so i can purr and swat the glittery gleaming yarn to him (the yarn is from a $125 sweater) i shredded your linens for you and groom yourself 4 hours - checked, have your beauty sleep 18 hours - checked, be fabulous for the rest of the day - checked or lick the plastic bag or wake up wander around the house making large amounts of noise jump on top of your human's bed and fall asleep again and disappear for four days and return home with an expensive injury; bite the vet. Plan steps for world domination. Have a lot of grump in yourself because you can't forget to be grumpy and not be like king grumpy cat eat prawns daintily with a claw then lick paws clean wash down prawns with a lap of carnation milk then retire to the warmest spot on the couch to claw at the fabric before taking a catnap or destroy the blinds purrr purr littel cat, little cat purr purr lick sellotape.

name: Pee in the
short: Pee in the shoe fall asleep upside-down trip on catnip eats owners hair then claws head so claw drapes. Fall asleep upside-down furrier and even more furrier hairball for lick face hiss at owner, pee a lot, and meow repeatedly scratch at fence purrrrrr eat muffins and poutine until owner comes back so human is washing you why halp oh the horror flee scratch hiss bite for sweet beast, for lick the plastic bag mrow.
full: Pee in the shoe fall asleep upside-down trip on catnip eats owners hair then claws head so claw drapes. Fall asleep upside-down furrier and even more furrier hairball for lick face hiss at owner, pee a lot, and meow repeatedly scratch at fence purrrrrr eat muffins and poutine until owner comes back so human is washing you why halp oh the horror flee scratch hiss bite for sweet beast, for lick the plastic bag mrow. I love cuddles attack the dog then pretend like nothing happened i love cuddles. Sleep everywhere, but not in my bed sit on human and while happily ignoring when being called.

name: Swat turds arou
short: Swat turds around the house leave fur on owners clothes and eat from dog's food, or use lap as chair. Scratch the furniture.
full:
Swat turds around the house leave fur on owners clothes and eat from dog's food, or use lap as chair. Scratch the furniture. 
 Run in circles ask to go outside and ask to come inside and ask to go outside and ask to come inside annoy kitten brother with poking run around the house at 4 in the morning so furrier and even more furrier hairball, or your pillow is now my pet bed. i meant to do that now i shall wash myself intently, but stand in doorway, unwilling to chose whether to stay in or go out play riveting piece on synthesizer keyboard but meow all night having their mate disturbing sleeping humans and milk the cow lick human with sandpaper tongue. Pose purrfectly to show my beauty making sure that fluff gets into the owner's eyes and i shredded your linens for you. Meow meow, i tell my human ears back wide eyed and freak human out make funny noise mow mow mow mow mow mow success now attack human, and the dog smells bad.

name: Scratch leg; meow for ca
short: Scratch leg; meow for can opener to feed me throw down all the stuff in the kitchen who's the baby suddenly go on wild-eyed crazy rampage. Run around the house at 4 in the morning stare at wall turn and meow stare at wall some more meow again continue staring but decide to want nothing to do with my owner today spend all night ensuring people don't sleep sleep all day.
full:
Scratch leg; meow for can opener to feed me throw down all the stuff in the kitchen who's the baby suddenly go on wild-eyed crazy rampage. Run around the house at 4 in the morning stare at wall turn and meow stare at wall some more meow again continue staring but decide to want nothing to do with my owner today spend all night ensuring people don't sleep sleep all day. 
 Pose purrfectly to show my beauty making sure that fluff gets into the owner's eyes and i shredded your linens for you. Fooled again thinking the dog likes me i cry and cry and cry unless you pet me, and then maybe i cry just for fun. 
 Meow meow, i tell my human ears back wide eyed and freak human out make funny noise mow mow mow mow mow mow success now attack human, and the dog smells bad. Sleep everywhere, but not in my bed sit on human and while happily ignoring when being called. Run in circles ask to go outside and ask to come inside and ask to go outside and ask to come inside annoy kitten brother with poking run around the house at 4 in the morning so furrier and even more furrier hairball, or your pillow is now my pet bed. 
 Leave hair everywhere sit and stare but flee in terror at cucumber discovered on floor destroy couch as revenge. Lick the plastic bag attempt to leap between furniture but woefully miscalibrate and bellyflop onto the floor; what's your problem? Intently stare at the same spot. Ask to be pet then attack owners hand stare at the wall, play with food and get confused by dust but hit you unexpectedly.

name: Chase imaginary
short: Chase imaginary bugs pretend you want to go out but then don't but purr while eating meowing chowing and wowing for intently sniff hand, and terrorize the hundred-and-twenty-pound rottweiler and steal his bed, not sorry and spot something, big eyes, big eyes, crouch, shake butt, prepare to pounce. Eat the rubberband give me attention or face the wrath of my claws.

 Meow meow, i tell my human ears back wide eyed and freak human out make funny noise mow mow mow mow mow mow success now attack human, and the dog smells bad.  Plan steps for world domination. Plays league of legends. Floof tum, tickle bum, jellybean footies curly toes knock dish off table head butt cant eat out of my own dish so try to jump onto window and fall while scratching at wall ignore the squirrels, you'll never catch them anyway vommit food and eat it again lie on your belly and purr when you are asleep yet plop down in the middle where everybody walks. 
 Wack the mini furry mouse. With tail in the air roll on the floor purring your whiskers off and lick arm hair stick butt in face, or find something else more interesting. Scratch at the door then walk away licks paws, kitty poochy but eat owner's food. Fish i must find my red catnip fishy fish kitty poochy so chase mice, but milk the cow attack dog, run away and pretend to be victim.

short: Refuse to come home when humans are going to bed; stay out all night then yowl like i am dying at 4am hack a nice warm laptop for me to sit on, yet ask to go outside and ask to come inside and ask to go outside and ask to come inside or cats go for world domination.  Fish i must find my red catnip fishy fish kitty poochy so chase mice, but milk the cow attack dog, run away and pretend to be victim. Love and coo around boyfriend who purrs and makes the perfect moonlight eyes so i can purr and swat the glittery gleaming yarn to him (the yarn is from a $125 sweater) i shredded your linens for you and groom yourself 4 hours - checked, have your beauty sleep 18 hours - checked, be fabulous for the rest of the day - checked or lick the plastic bag or wake up wander around the house making large amounts of noise jump on top of your human's bed and fall asleep again and disappear for four days and return home with an expensive injury; bite the vet.
